body:
This introduces a device/host sync. TensorFlow tries very hard to avoid that. 

An example on how to address such issue: 

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/kernels/where_op.cc#L253

Another common practice is to check the indices on GPU, and do nothing with invalid indicies.
